name: Fighter Jet Kids Reversible Bucket Hat
description:
gemibaby's famous reversible bucket hats are all handmade from designer cotton and feature a deep crown and gentle sloping brim. Finished with meticulous top stitching they are designed to last a lifetime. And because they are fully reversible you really are getting two hats for the price of one!

This hat features red and grey circles on one side with small fighter jet images, and red on red mini chevron on the other. 

** Each hat is made to order and the usual lead time is 3 weeks - HOWEVER all custom orders placed this weekend that are required for Christmas will be posted by Wednesday 18th December at the latest **

Available in three sizes:- Small (19"/48cm), Medium (20"/51cm) & Large (22"/55cm). All hats can be ordered with or without a chin strap.

Please specify the required size at checkout and if you require a chin strap or not.

Registered Postage on a single hat is $6, or for 2 - 6 hats postage will be in a $9 pre paid satchel with tracking. Please contact me for larger orders.

Adult reversible hats also available on request (RRP $39.95), as well as Baby Adjustable Hats (RRP $24.95)

name: Purple/Neon Pink Loveheart Short-Ties
description:
These adorable short-ties are a perfect addition to any girls wardrobe. Bright, fun and super comfortable they feature 2 ribbons on either side seam to gather them up as high or low as you want.  

Made from super soft purple loveheart print fabric it is sure to be a favourite with your little miss.

Matching hats & tees also available

name: Pink Little Red Riding Hood Tulip Skirt
description:
These tulip skirts are a perfect addition to any girls wardrobe - layer them with boots and leggings in the winter or wear them on their own in summer.  They have a small ruffle above the soft elastic waist band and look perfect teamed with a tucked in T-Shirt.

Made from the very popular Riley Blake 'Little Red Riding Hood' range of fabric they are sure to be a favourite with your little miss. 

Matching t-shirts and hats also available 


RRP $25

name: Pink & Purple Cuzco Ra Ra Skirt
description:
These Ra Ra skirts are a perfect addition to any girls wardrobe - layer them with boots and leggings in the winter or wear them on their own in summer.  They are easily the best skirt for a girl who loves to twirl!

Made from stunning Cuzco fabric featuring flowers and peacocks they are sure to be a favourite with your little miss.  Available in sizes 2 & 3.

RRP $35

Matching long sleeve T-shirt with applique available on request for an additional $10.

name: Dreamy Horses Princess Pinny
description:
This gorgeous pinny is the perfect all season dress.  Wear it with leggings, boots and a long sleeve tee in winter or on its own in summer.  

Made with gorgeous black fabric with sweet pink, red & grey horses and trees with pink floral trim.  

RRP $40

Pattern by BOO! Designs
